content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
use earthquake; 

DROP EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT MyCsvFormat;
DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE myData;
DROP EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.EarthquakeData;

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT MyCsvFormat
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS (
        FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
        STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
        FIRST_ROW = 2
    )
);

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE myData
WITH (
    LOCATION ='https://azureprojstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/newworld/',
    CREDENTIAL = secretkey
);

 
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.EarthquakeData (

    magnitude FLOAT,
    place VARCHAR(200) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
    country VARCHAR(100) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
    time  BIGINT,
    updated  BIGINT,
    felt VARCHAR(10) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
    alert VARCHAR(10) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
    status VARCHAR(10) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
    tsunami VARCHAR(20) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
    rms FLOAT,
    magType VARCHAR(10) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
    fetature VARCHAR(200) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
    latitude VARCHAR(200) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8, 
    -- Add other columns here
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'Earthquake/silver/earthquake_silver.csv',  -- Path inside the container
    DATA_SOURCE = myData,
    FILE_FORMAT = MyCsvFormat
);




-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    top 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://azureprojstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/newworld/Earthquake/silver/earthquake_silver.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE
    ) AS [result]
    


    

-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT count(*), max(time/1000), min (time/1000)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://azureprojstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/newworld/Earthquake/silver/earthquake_silver.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE
    ) AS [result]






 


 SELECT TOP 10 *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'silver/earthquake_silver.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = myData,
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
) AS rows;

SELECT TOP 1 *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'Earthquake/silver/earthquake_silver.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = [myData],
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
)   AS [result];







SELECT TOP 1 *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'Earthquake/silver/earth.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = [myData],
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
)   AS [result];
